column5: Well I think that on Tuesday afternoon I am gonna takeoff and go to Whitemans creek in Paris Anyone interested in meeting for a couple hours I will probably fish timm atleast 8 but maybe later depending on how I feel, weather, bite etc? I would most likely be in paris about 345-400  PM me or post on here if anyone is interested... I fly fish BTW and it will be all trout fishing for me anyway...  Bill
Ohh yea and I do have some extra equipment if someone wants to try it out
Reply sent! Anyone else... Tues or Wed will work for me...

Dates are subject to weather - fly fishing only.  I am going to be at the UG next Thursday (June 7).  I am also planning to fish the UG on Tuesday or Wednesday or thursday (June 12, 13, 14).  Available most Tuesday, Wedenesday and Thursdays - never on Monday and not on Friday because of Friday traffic.  carp-starter
I am gonna fish paris tuesday... if your interested in joining me shoot me a PM

Bill Parker  I am sorry but I cannot make it next Tuesday nor Wednesday.  Maybe some other time before the water temperature reaches the danger point of about 68-70 degrees F. You know my days of the week.  carp-starter
Sounds good to me... any other takers... no experience necessary
